languages.text: "С другой стороны, именно за это я и держу их подле. Кор и Торра хорошо знают, чья именно рука вытащила их из выгребной ямы, гордо именуемой Теневыми Кварталами Футфола. И кто все это время подкармливал их ненасытного зверя, именуемого жаждой наживы? Нет, они не предадут меня хотя бы потому, что знают — отныне я в вашей свите, шерин. А уж настолько большой кусок сладкого имперского рулета они просто не в силах упустить".

traits.locale_text: "С другой стороны, именно за это я и держу их подле. Кор и Торра хорошо знают, чья именно рука вытащила их из выгребной ямы, гордо именуемой Теневыми Кварталами Футфола. И кто все это время подкармливал их ненасытного зверя, именуемого жаждой наживы? Нет, они не предадут меня хотя бы потому, что знают — отныне я в вашей свите, шерин. А уж настолько большой кусок сладкого имперского рулета они просто не в силах упустить".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."
languages.original_text: "С другой стороны, именно за это я и держу их подле. Кор и Торра хорошо знают, чья именно рука вытащила их из выгребной ямы, гордо именуемой Теневыми Кварталами Футфола. И кто все это время подкармливал их ненасытного зверя, именуемого жаждой наживы? Нет, они не предадут меня хотя бы потому, что знают — отныне я в вашей свите, шерин. А уж настолько большой кусок сладкого имперского рулета они просто не в силах упустить".

traits.locale_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know whose hand lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called Footfall Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding their ravenous beast, the insatiable lust for gain. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They will not let a piece of the biggest sweet roll in the Imperium pass them by."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know whose hand lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called Footfall Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding their ravenous beast, the insatiable lust for gain. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They will not let a piece of the biggest sweet roll in the Imperium pass them by."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “但另一方面，我也正是因为这个原因才接近他们。科尔和托菈很清楚，是谁把他们从那个被称为‘阴影区’的粪坑里捞了出来，也很清楚是谁一直在喂养他们心中那头贪婪的畜生，满足他们对钱财贪得无厌的胃口。如果他们知道我成为了你的随行人员，他们是绝对不会背叛我的，亲爱的。他们绝不会让整个帝国最可口的馅饼从他们嘴边溜走，他们一定会想办法分一杯羹。”
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: “但另一方面，我也正是因为这个原因才接近他们。科尔和托菈很清楚，是谁把他们从那个被称为‘阴影区’的粪坑里捞了出来，也很清楚是谁一直在喂养他们心中那头贪婪的畜生，满足他们对钱财贪得无厌的胃口。如果他们知道我成为了你的随行人员，他们是绝对不会背叛我的，亲爱的。他们绝不会让整个帝国最可口的馅饼从他们嘴边溜走，他们一定会想办法分一杯羹。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

languages.text: «Por otro lado, por eso los mantengo cerca. Kor y Torra saben quién les sacó del agujero que con orgullo llaman los barrios bajos, y quién ha estado alimentando a la bestia voraz que es su sed insaciable de dinero. No, no van a traicionarme, aunque solo sea porque saben que ahora soy parte de su séquito, shereen. No van a dejar que la tarta más grande del Imperium pase a su lado sin intentar llevarse un trozo».
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Por otro lado, por eso los mantengo cerca. Kor y Torra saben quién les sacó del agujero que con orgullo llaman los barrios bajos, y quién ha estado alimentando a la bestia voraz que es su sed insaciable de dinero. No, no van a traicionarme, aunque solo sea porque saben que ahora soy parte de su séquito, shereen. No van a dejar que la tarta más grande del Imperium pase a su lado sin intentar llevarse un trozo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「その一方で、だからこそあたしは彼らを近くに置いているの。コーとトッラは、彼らをシャドウクォーターと呼ばれる掃き溜めから連れ出したのが誰なのかをわかっているわ。そして誰があの貪欲な獣、彼らの飽くなき金銭欲に餌を与えてきたのかもね。いいえ、彼らがあたしを裏切ることはないわ。あたしが今、あんたの側近の一人であることはわかっているからね、シャリーン。帝国で最も大きなパイを一切れも自分たちのものにすることなく見過ごすことなんてありえないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「その一方で、だからこそあたしは彼らを近くに置いているの。コーとトッラは、彼らをシャドウクォーターと呼ばれる掃き溜めから連れ出したのが誰なのかをわかっているわ。そして誰があの貪欲な獣、彼らの飽くなき金銭欲に餌を与えてきたのかもね。いいえ、彼らがあたしを裏切ることはないわ。あたしが今、あんたの側近の一人であることはわかっているからね、シャリーン。帝国で最も大きなパイを一切れも自分たちのものにすることなく見過ごすことなんてありえないでしょう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: 「その一方で、だからこそあたしは彼らを近くに置いているの。コーとトッラは、彼らをシャドウクォーターと呼ばれる掃き溜めから連れ出したのが誰なのかをわかっているわ。そして誰があの貪欲な獣、彼らの飽くなき金銭欲に餌を与えてきたのかもね。いいえ、彼らがあたしを裏切ることはないわ。あたしが今、あんたの側近の一人であることはわかっているからね、シャリーン。帝国で最も大きなパイを一切れも自分たちのものにすることなく見過ごすことなんてありえないでしょう」

languages.text: "Andererseits halte ich sie genau deswegen in meiner Nähe. Kor und Torra wissen, wer sie aus der Jauchegrube gezogen hat, die stolz 'die Schattenquartiere' genannt wird. Und wer dieses unersättliche Monstrum füttert, ihre unstillbare Geldgier. Nein, sie werden mich nicht verraten, wenn auch nur, weil sie wissen, dass ich nun Teil Eures Gefolge bin, Shereen. Sie werden den größten Kuchen im Imperium nicht vorbeiziehen lassen, ohne zu versuchen, ein Stück davon abzubekommen."
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Andererseits halte ich sie genau deswegen in meiner Nähe. Kor und Torra wissen, wer sie aus der Jauchegrube gezogen hat, die stolz 'die Schattenquartiere' genannt wird. Und wer dieses unersättliche Monstrum füttert, ihre unstillbare Geldgier. Nein, sie werden mich nicht verraten, wenn auch nur, weil sie wissen, dass ich nun Teil Eures Gefolge bin, Shereen. Sie werden den größten Kuchen im Imperium nicht vorbeiziehen lassen, ohne zu versuchen, ein Stück davon abzubekommen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est justement pour ça que je les garde près de moi. Kor et Torra savent qui les a tirés du cloaque qui se fait fièrement appeler le Quartier des Ombres, ils savent qui continue à nourrir la bête vorace qu'est leur soif insatiable d'argent. Non, ils ne me trahiront pas, ne serait-ce que parce qu'ils savent que je fais maintenant partie de votre entourage, shereen. Ils ne vont pas laisser passer le plus gros gâteau de l'Imperium sans essayer de prendre leur part. »
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: « C'est justement pour ça que je les garde près de moi. Kor et Torra savent qui les a tirés du cloaque qui se fait fièrement appeler le Quartier des Ombres, ils savent qui continue à nourrir la bête vorace qu'est leur soif insatiable d'argent. Non, ils ne me trahiront pas, ne serait-ce que parce qu'ils savent que je fais maintenant partie de votre entourage, shereen. Ils ne vont pas laisser passer le plus gros gâteau de l'Imperium sans essayer de prendre leur part. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Öte yandan onları bu yüzden yakınımda tuttum. Kor ve Torra, Gölge Mahalli adıyla yüceltilen o lağım çukurundan onların kimin çıkardığını iyi bilir. O doymak bilmez servet düşkünlüklerini besleyenin kim olduğunu da. Hayır, bana ihanet etmezler. Hele ki artık senin çevrene dâhil olduğumu biliyorlar ya şirinim. İmparatorluk'taki en büyük pastanın, onlar da bir dilim almadan önlerinden geçip gitmesine izin verecek tipler değillerdir."
languages.original_text: "On the other hand, this is why I am keeping them close. Kor and Torra know who lifted them out of the cesspit proudly called the Shadow Quarters. And who has been feeding that ravenous beast, their insatiable lust for lucre. No, they are not going to betray me, if only because they know I am now a part of your entourage, shereen. They're not going to let the biggest pie in the Imperium pass them by without trying to get a slice for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Öte yandan onları yakınımda tutma sebebim de bu. Kor ve Torra onları Gölge Mahalli gibi bir isim takılarak yüceltilen o lağım çukurundan çıkaran kişinin kim olduğunu bilirler. Onların o doymak bilmez servet düşkünlüğünü besleyenin kim olduğunu da. Hayır, bana ihanet etmezler. Özellikle de artık senin çevrene dâhil olduğumu bildikleri için şirinim. İmparatorluk'taki en büyük pastanın, onlar da bir dilim almadan önlerinden geçip gitmesine izin verecek tipler değillerdir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
